com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core

Interface ILPLocationListener


  • public interface ILPLocationListener
    A location listener receives updates concerning locations .
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdd(ILPLocation location)
      Informs this listener that a new location has been added to the location provider associated with the application.
      void onCheckInFailure(ILPLocation location, ILPError error)
      Notifies this listener of a failed check-in.
      void onCheckInSuccess(ILPLocation location)
      Notifies this listener of a successful check-in.
      void onDelete(ILPID id)
      Informs this listener that a location previously known to the location provider associated with the application was deleted from the provider.
      void onEntry(ILPLocation location)
      Informs this listener that the server has determined that the given location has been entered.
      void onExit(ILPLocation location)
      Informs this listener that the server has determined that the given location has been exited.
      void onModify(ILPLocation location)
      Informs this listener that a location already known to the location provider associated with the application was modified in some way.

    • Method Detail

      • onAdd

        void onAdd(ILPLocation location)
        Informs this listener that a new location has been added to the location provider associated with the application.
        Parameters:
        location - the location that was added to the location provider (should never be null)

      • onCheckInFailure

        void onCheckInFailure(ILPLocation location,
                    ILPError error)
        Notifies this listener of a failed check-in.
        Parameters:
        location - the location at which the failed check-in was to have occurred (should never be null)
        error - the error that caused the failure (should never be null)

      • onCheckInSuccess

        void onCheckInSuccess(ILPLocation location)
        Notifies this listener of a successful check-in.
        Parameters:
        location - the location at which the successful check-in occurred (should never be null)

      • onDelete

        void onDelete(ILPID id)
        Informs this listener that a location previously known to the location provider associated with the application was deleted from the provider.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier of the location that was deleted (should never be null)

      • onEntry

        void onEntry(ILPLocation location)
        Informs this listener that the server has determined that the given location has been entered.
        Parameters:
        location - the location that was entered (should never be null)

      • onExit

        void onExit(ILPLocation location)
        Informs this listener that the server has determined that the given location has been exited.
        Parameters:
        location - the location that was exited (should never be null)

      • onModify

        void onModify(ILPLocation location)
        Informs this listener that a location already known to the location provider associated with the application was modified in some way.
        Parameters:
        location - the location that was modified (should never be null)
